Dating: ROMAN PERIOD (not before); ROMAN PERIOD; BYZANTINE PERIOD (not after)
Name: Lamp with cross
Description: This lamp of terracotta, which was acquired through an exchange with the Museum of Cairo in 1905-1906, carries as medallion  a monogrammatic cross with the loop of the letter "rho" at the right. The filling hole is off centre, pierced under the left lateral arm of the cross. The piece dates from the 2nd to the 4th century.
